page.title: 16 A Schoolday in 1985
page.content: I am called Clare and I am 9 years old. I awake at 7.30am, have a wash and then dress in my school uniform. I do my piano practice before I have a breakfast of cornflakes and toast. Then I clean my teeth and collect my swimming kit. Soon I join other children in the school taxi. At school we play a game in the playground until 9 o'clock when we go to our classrooms to have the register marked. Then we go to the hall for assembly and hymn practice. After that, it's swimming in the school pool until break-time. Break lasts 15 minutes and it's back to a maths lesson. We finish at noon for lunch, which we have in the school hall. Then more lessons until 3.30p.m. At home time I go for a piano lesson. Later I have an evening meal. Then I watch T.V. for a while, before I go to bed at 8.30p.m. Tuesdays are so busy!
